  • Packages that use ApplicationPreferencesModel 
    Package Description
    charts

    • Uses of ApplicationPreferencesModel in charts

      Constructors in charts with parameters of type ApplicationPreferencesModel 
      Constructor Description
      ChartModel​(ApplicationPreferencesModel preferences, Stock stock)
      Constructs a chart model holding data for the specified stock and getting application preferences from the specified ApplicationPreferencesModel.

    • Uses of ApplicationPreferencesModel in main

      Constructors in main with parameters of type ApplicationPreferencesModel 
      Constructor Description
      MainController​(javax.swing.JDialog preferencesDialog, StockFinderDialog stockFinderDialog, WatchlistFrame watchlist, IWatchlistModel watchlistModel, ApplicationPreferencesModel preferences, IPreferencesPersistence persistence, MainFrame mainFrame, MainMenuBar mainMenuBar)
      Constructs the main controller, establishes a connection to the active data provider on program start and restores both watchlist and charts from persistent storage.

    • Uses of ApplicationPreferencesModel in preferences

      Methods in preferences that return ApplicationPreferencesModel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ApplicationPreferencesModel IPreferencesPersistence.loadApplicationPreferences()
      Load application preferences.
      ApplicationPreferencesModel PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON.loadApplicationPreferences()
      Load application preferences by deserializing an ApplicationPreferencesModel instance from the configuration file.
      Methods in preferences with parameters of type ApplicationPreferencesModel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void IPreferencesPersistence.storeApplicationPreferences​(ApplicationPreferencesModel applicationPreferences)
      Store application preferences.
      void PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON.storeApplicationPreferences​(ApplicationPreferencesModel applicationPreferences)
      Store application preferences by serializing an ApplicationPreferncesModel instance to a json string and writing it to the configuration file.
      Constructors in preferences with parameters of type ApplicationPreferencesModel 
      Constructor Description

      Constructs a data provider preferences panel.
      PreferencesController​(ApplicationPreferencesModel model, PreferencesDialog preferencesDialog, IPreferencesPersistence persistence)
      Constructs new preferences controller.
